GK20bhveni_u:3606: akṛpaṇamarukśrāntaṃ jīvyājjanaḥ puruṣāyuṣaṃ $ bhavatu bhagavanbhaktirdvaitaṃ vinā puruṣottame
GK20bhveni_u:3607: dayitabhuvano vidvadbandhurguṇeṣu viśeṣavi- ē̃ tsatatasukṛtī bhūyādbhūpaḥ prasādhitamaṇḍalaḥ api ca VERSE_6.47
GK20bhveni_u:3608: avanimavanipālāḥ pāntu vṛṣṭiṃ vidhattāṃ $ jagati jaladharālī śasyapūrṇāstu
GK20bhveni_u:3610: tvayi muranarakārau bhaktiradvaitayogā- ē̃ dbhavatu mama sudīrghaṃ
GK20bhveni_u:3617: idaṃ ca vidagdhasnigdhaviyogadurmanasā vipralapitaṃ tena kavinā /
GK20bhveni_u:3619: stā goṣṭhyaḥ kṣayamāgatā guṇalavaślāghyāstu vācaḥ satām /
GK20bhveni_u:3620: sālaṃkārarasaprasannamadhurākārāḥ kavīnāṃ giraḥ prāptā nāśamayaṃ tu bhūmivalaye jīyātprabandho mahān //
